mapper.sql: SELECT post_no, board_no, member_no, post_title, post_content, TO_CHAR(reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MM:SS') AS reg_date, view_count, like_count, member_nickname, post_status_flag, post_notice_flag, notice_index FROM post WHERE board_no = #{boardNo} AND post.post_status_flag = '0' ORDER BY reg_date DESC
mapper.select:
SELECT post.post_no, post.board_no, post.member_no, post.post_title, post.post_content, TO_CHAR(post.reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MM:SS') AS reg_date, post.view_count, post.like_count, post.member_nickname, post.post_status_flag, post.post_notice_flag, post.notice_index, post.cafe_url FROM post, board
post.board_no = board.board_no AND post.cafe_url = #{cafeURL} AND board.board_type = 'cb100' AND post.post_status_flag = '0'
ORDER BY reg_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post ( post_no, post_title, board_no, board_name, member_no, cafe_url, post_content, reg_date, member_nickname, post_notice_flag) VALUES ( SEQ_POST_POST_NO.NEXTVAL, #{postTitle}, #{boardNo}, #{boardName}, #{memberNo}, #{cafeUrl}, #{postContent}, SYSDATE, #{memberNickname}, #{postNoticeFlag})
mapper.update: UPDATE post SET post_title = #{postTitle}, board_no = #{boardNo}, board_name = #{boardName}, post_content = #{postContent}, post_notice_flag = #{postNoticeFlag} WHERE post_no = #{postNo}
